item.title: Grandparents to the Grand Canyon, Part V
item.description: Mesa Verde So my granddad (Poppa) has well-rounded interests and when two or more of those interest can be sparked by a single place or topic he’s a very perky fellow. The cultural and natural significance of Mesa Verde NP was such that we all were perked up. (More to come on this). Traveling Back The drive home wasn’t too eventful, especially in light of what we had just experienced.
